vsParam:
Uh? Is that Popy spinning around over there?
Is there anything wrong with it...

Popy is broken!?
This is bad! We must tell Silver Birch Sensei at once!

Ah, you are here. You are really not easy to find.
It took me a lot of time and energy to find you.

Hazel! Wh-what's going on?
Is Popy broken?

Uncle planned to make a friend for Popy,
but he failed. This is the so called defective product.

Uh, I see.
I thought something went wrong with Popy!

But why could Popy run normally,
yet Pepy couldn't?

Ah, that's because the parts used to make Popy ran out.
Uncle replaced them with other parts, but the result is not as expected.

I guess we must destroy it,
but it looks so kawaii, right? I can't do it.

A failed work should act like one.
Why can't it can explode by itself, ho ho...

D-don't say such scary things!
Is there anything we can do to save it?

Um... If we can replace all the defective parts,
it may work normally.

Got it! We'll go make parts for replacement.
Don't rush to destroy it!

Hazel! We brought you all the parts for replacement!
Replace with them!

Wow, you really made them.
Got it. Please wait a minute.

Yeah. As you can see, it stops fidgeting.
It looks normal now.

To prevent any further problem,
I shut off its speech function.

Whatever!
At least it doesn't need to be destroyed. That's great!

But Hazel, you managed to replace all parts so quickly...
Looks like you are pretty familiar with mechanics.

N-no. It's just that my uncle always asks me to help. Over
time, I also develop some mechanical skills passively.

Really... After seeing how engrossed you were in dealing with
mechanics, I don't think that you developed these skills passively.

It comes from behind us.
And sounds familiar.

Me, either! But... We can't escape from reality.
On the count of three. One, two... three!

Th-that's right! Let's turn back together. Are you ready?
Um... One, two, three!

Gosh! Popy... No,
this is a group of Pepies!!

I told him repeatedly not to make that anymore...
What the heck! Uncle, wait to be scolded!!

In for a penny and in for a pound. I'm going to fix
them all, and shove them into uncle's lab!

Got it?
Get ready for your upcoming job, [px]!

How could it happen...
How long will it take for us to repair all of them...
